short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically add images to or remove images from all Quizlet cards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
âœ… A handy Quizlet add-on that will save you the manual effort of adding an image to each card. The extension won't change images for cards you've already set.

âœ… Doesn't require Quizlet Plus (recommended image search is built into Quizlet but you must manually add an image to each card in your set).
